name: G√©n√©rer et publier du contenu sur les r√©seaux sociaux avec Gemini, Kie.ai et Late API
description:
## üìò Aper√ßu
Ce flux de travail automatise la **publication de contenu sur les r√©seaux sociaux de bout en bout** aliment√©e par **Late API**.  
Il g√©n√®re du contenu textuel avec **Google Gemini**, cr√©e des visuels de marque avec **Kie.ai**, t√©l√©charge des m√©dias sur **Late**, et publie sur plusieurs plateformes (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).  

C'est une automatisation pr√™te √† la production pour les √©quipes marketing qui souhaitent √©conomiser des heures de travail en laissant l'IA g√©rer √† la fois la r√©daction et le design ‚Äî le tout √† l'int√©rieur de n8n.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Comment √ßa fonctionne
1. **G√©n√©rer du contenu textuel** ‚Üí Google Gemini produit des textes optimis√©s pour chaque plateforme (ton et longueur adapt√©s √† chaque r√©seau).  
2. **G√©n√©rer des visuels** ‚Üí Kie.ai Seedream v4 cr√©e des images de marque 1080x1080.  
3. **T√©l√©charger sur Late** ‚Üí les m√©dias sont stock√©s en utilisant l'API de t√©l√©chargement de Late (gestion des petits et grands fichiers).  
4. **Publier** ‚Üí les publications sont cr√©√©es via Late API sur les plateformes activ√©es avec le bon mappage `{ platform, accountId }`.  
5. **Notifier** ‚Üí les journaux de succ√®s sont envoy√©s via Slack, Discord, Email et Webhook.  

## üõ† √âtapes de configuration
- **Temps de configuration :** ~10‚Äì15 minutes  
- **√âtapes :**
  1. Ajoutez vos **cl√©s API** dans les identifiants n8n :
     - Google Gemini API (PaLM)
     - Kie.ai (Seedream)
     - Late API
  2. Ins√©rez vos **ID de compte** (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok) dans le n≈ìud **Param√®tres par d√©faut**.
  3. Choisissez les plateformes √† activer (`ENABLE_FACEBOOK`, `ENABLE_INSTAGRAM`, etc.).
  4. D√©finissez votre **Type d'entreprise** et **Sujet de contenu** (par exemple, ‚Äúune entreprise technologique‚Äù / ‚Äúlancement d'un nouveau produit‚Äù).
  5. Ex√©cutez le flux de travail.  

## üìù Remarques
- Des **notes autocollantes** sont incluses dans le flux de travail pour guider chaque section : Aper√ßu, Pr√©requis, Param√®tres par d√©faut, G√©n√©ration de contenu, G√©n√©ration d'images, T√©l√©chargement de m√©dias, Logique de publication, Notifications, Gestion des erreurs.  
- Toutes les cl√©s API sont g√©r√©es via **Identifiants** (pas de codage en dur).  
- Du contenu de secours est inclus au cas o√π Gemini √©chouerait √† analyser.  
- Les fichiers image volumineux (>4MB) sont g√©r√©s avec le flux de t√©l√©chargement multipart de Late.  

## üí∏ Co√ªt par flux (estim√©)
- **Late API** : 0,00 $ dans les plans gratuits/illimit√©s, ou ‚âà 0,11 $/publication dans le plan Build (13 $/120 publications).  
- **Google Gemini** : ~0,0001‚Äì0,0004 $ par publication (‚âà200 tokens en/vers).  
- **Kie.ai (Seedream)** : ‚âà 0,01‚Äì0,02 $ par image g√©n√©r√©e.  

‚û°Ô∏è **Total : ~0,01 ‚Äì 0,12 $ par publication**, selon principalement votre plan Late et les cr√©dits Kie.ai.

## üéØ Cas d'utilisation
- √âquipes marketing automatisant des campagnes multiplateformes.  
- Fondateurs solitaires publiant du contenu quotidiennement sans effort de design/de r√©daction.  
- Agences augmentant la gestion des r√©seaux sociaux avec l'IA + l'automatisation.  

## üì¢ Cr√©dits
- Construit par **Adrian (RoboMarketing)** pour le **n8n Arena Challenge ‚Äì Septembre 2025**.  
- Aliment√© par :
  - [Gemini API](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/get-started)  
  - [Kie.ai Seedream](https://kie.ai/seedream-api)  
  - [Late API](https://getlate.dev/docs)

workflow.name: LATE concurs - AI-Generated Social Media Posting

parameters.url:
={{ $('LATE ‚Äì Init Upload files > 4MB').item.json.uploadUrl
   || $('LATE ‚Äì Init Upload files >4MB').item.json.url }}

parameters.content: # AI-Generated Social Media Posting with Late API

## üìä Workflow Overview

This workflow automates social media publishing:

1. Generate platform-optimized text with **Google Gemini**.  
2. Generate branded images with **Kie.ai**.  
3. Upload media to **Late API**.  
4. Publish posts on selected platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).  
5. Send structured success notifications (Slack, Discord, Email, Webhook).

## üîë Prerequisites & Credentials

Required credentials:
- **Google Gemini API key** (PaLM)
- **Kie.ai API key** (DreamSeed model)
- **Late API key**

Required account IDs (from Late dashboard):
- FACEBOOK_ACCOUNT_ID
- INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT_ID
- LINKEDIN_ACCOUNT_ID
- TIKTOK_ACCOUNT_ID

‚ö†Ô∏è Each post requires both { platform, accountId }.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Default Settings

This node defines workflow variables:

- BUSINESS_TYPE ‚Üí type of company
- CONTENT_TOPIC ‚Üí topic for content generation
- ENABLE_* ‚Üí toggle platforms (true/false)
- *_ACCOUNT_ID ‚Üí required Late account IDs

üí° Change values here to control which platforms are active.

## üß† Content Generation

**Gemini ‚Äì Generate Content**
- Calls Google Gemini (gemini-2.5-flash).
- Produces JSON with platform-specific texts:
  { topic, facebook, instagram, tiktok, linkedin, hashtags, bestTime }

**Parse & Filter Platforms**
- Extracts texts per platform.
- Filters only enabled platforms.
- Adds platformCount for reporting.

## üé® Image Generation

**Model & provider**
- Kie.ai ‚Üí ByteDance **Seedream v4** (T2I + I2I + Editing)
- Flow:
  - Create Task ‚Üí Poll recordInfo ‚Üí use `resultUrls[0]` as CDN URL (passed to Late API)

### üí∏ Pricing (as of 2025-09-26)
Assumptions: 1MP ~ 1024√ó1024 image. Higher resolutions scale proportionally.

- **Seedream via Kie.ai (v3 reference)**: ~**$0.0175 / image** (3.5 credits) ‚Äî typical rate cited for Seedream v3 on Kie.ai.  
  *Indicative for v4; check your Kie.ai plan.*  
- **Seedream via BytePlus (official API)**: **$0.03 / image** (+ **200 free images**).  
- **Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 wrapper)**: **‚âà $0.12 / edit** on Premium monthly (‚âà619 edits for $59.9); basic one-time pack ‚âà **$0.25 / edit**.  
- **FAL.ai (aggregator, FLUX family)** *(normalized to 1MP)*:
  - FLUX.1 **dev**: **$0.025 / MP** (‚âà$0.025 / 1MP image)
  - FLUX.1 **pro**: **$0.05 / MP**
  - FLUX.1 **schnell**: **$0.003 / MP** (fast/cheap, lower fidelity)

### ‚úÖ Why Seedream (Kie.ai) here
1) **Quality & prompt adherence** suitable for brand assets; strong editing & consistency.  
2) **Simple integration** (task ‚Üí poll ‚Üí CDN URL) fits n8n + Late upload flow.  
3) **Cost-effective at scale** versus Nano Banana subscriptions; comparable or better than many FAL image models for 1MP, with higher consistency for marketing creatives.

> **Rule of thumb (1K images @ ~1MP):**  
> Kie.ai Seedream v3 ref ~$17.5 ‚Üí BytePlus $30 ‚Üí FAL FLUX dev ~$25 ‚Üí Nano Banana ~$120 (Premium) / ~$250 (one-time).

## üì¶ Media Upload to Late

Uploads images to Late API depending on size:

- ‚â§ 4MB ‚Üí direct upload
- > 4MB ‚Üí multipart flow:
   1. Init Upload (Late API)
   2. Download Large File
   3. Upload to Storage (PUT)

‚úÖ Ensures files are properly stored before posting.

## üöÄ Publishing Logic

Branches per platform:
- IF Facebook ‚Üí Late Create Post Facebook
- IF Instagram ‚Üí Late Create Post Instagram
- IF LinkedIn ‚Üí Late Create Post LinkedIn
- IF TikTok ‚Üí Late Create Post TikTok

Each post sends:
POST https://getlate.dev/api/v1/posts
{
  content: "text + hashtags",
  publishNow: true,
  platforms: [{ platform, accountId }],
  mediaItems: [{ type: "image", url }]
}

## üì¢ Notifications & Logging

**Merge** responses from all platforms.

**Success Notification & Logging**
- Builds structured messages for:
  - Slack
  - Discord
  - Email
  - Webhook

Includes:
- Post ID
- Platform
- Content preview
- Timestamp

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Error Handling

Common issues:
- Missing accountId ‚Üí check Default Settings.
- Large files failing ‚Üí check upload URL from Late.
- Empty content ‚Üí Gemini fallback text used.
- Invalid credentials ‚Üí update API keys.

üõ† Errors stop only the failing branch; other platforms continue.

## üîë [Gemini API (Google AI Studio)](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/get-started) Gemini API Key

Steps
1) Open Google AI Studio ‚Üí API Keys.
2) Click **Create API key** (choose or create a Cloud project if prompted).
3) Copy the key and store it securely.
4) (Optional) Restrict the key (HTTP referrers / IPs) in Google Cloud Console.

Use in requests
- Header:  x-goog-api-key: YOUR_KEY
- Or as query param: ?key=YOUR_KEY

Quick test (curl)
curl -s -X POST \
  "https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.5-flash:generateContent?key=YOUR_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "contents":[{"parts":[{"text":"Say hello"}]}],
    "generationConfig":{"maxOutputTokens":64}
  }'

n8n
- Create Credential: HTTP Bearer / API Key (per node), or store as env var.
- Use in **Gemini ‚Äì Generate Content** HTTP node.

## üß© [Kie.ai (Seedream)](https://kie.ai/seedream-api)

Steps
1) Sign up / log in at Kie.ai ‚Üí API Key Management.
2) Create an API key (Bearer token) and copy it.
3) (Optional) Check credits endpoint to verify: GET /api/v1/chat/credit

Use in requests
- Header:  Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KIE_TOKEN

Seedream v4 flow (used here)
- POST /api/v1/jobs/createTask
  { "model": "bytedance/seedream-v4-text-to-image", "input": { "prompt": "...", "image_size": "square_hd", "image_resolution": "1K" } }
- Poll: GET /api/v1/jobs/recordInfo?taskId=...
- Use data.resultJson.resultUrls[0] as CDN image URL.

n8n
- Create Credential: HTTP Bearer ‚ÄúKie.ai‚Äù.
- Attach to **Kie.ai ‚Äì Generate Image** and **Obtain Image** nodes.

## üöÄ [Late API](https://getlate.dev/docs)

Steps
1) Create an account at getlate.dev and connect social accounts.
2) Generate an **API key** in the Late dashboard (Account/Settings ‚Üí API).
3) Copy the key and keep it secure.

Use in requests
- Header:  Authorization: Bearer YOUR_LATE_KEY

Core endpoints (used here)
- POST /api/v1/media      ‚Üí upload images (small: multipart, large: init + PUT)
- POST /api/v1/posts      ‚Üí publish or schedule posts
  {
    "content": "...",
    "publishNow": true,
    "platforms": [{ "platform": "facebook", "accountId": "..." }],
    "mediaItems": [{ "type": "image", "url": "CDN_URL" }]
  }

n8n
- Create Credential: HTTP Bearer ‚ÄúLate‚Äù.
- Attach to upload + posting nodes (Media & Create Post).

### üí∏ Run Cost Cheat-Sheet ‚Äî ‚ÄúAI-Generated Social Post‚Äù Flow

**What gets billed per run**

* **Text generation (Gemini 2.5 Flash)**

  * *Free Tier (AI Studio / API free tier):* **$0** (rate-limited). ([Google AI for Developers][1])
  * *Paid Tier (interactive API):* **$0.30 / 1M input tokens** and **$2.50 / 1M output tokens**.
    *Batch API is ~50% of interactive prices.* ([Google AI for Developers][1])

* **Image generation (Seedream v4 via Kie.ai)**

  * Typical credit pricing: ~**$0.04‚Äì$0.069 per image** depending on plan/volume. ([Seedream-4][2])

* **Publishing (Late API)**

  * **Subscription-based**; marginal cost per post is **$0** within plan limits
    (Free: 10 posts/mo; Build: 120 posts/mo; Accelerate/Dominate/Enterprise: unlimited posts). ([Late][3])

---

**Quick estimate (paid Gemini tier)**

```
Estimated LLM cost = 
  (input_tokens / 1,000,000) * $0.30 +
  (output_tokens / 1,000,000) * $2.50
Total per run ‚âà LLM cost + image_cost (‚âà $0.04‚Äì$0.069) + $0 (Late)
```

**Example:** ~600 input tokens + ~800 output tokens
LLM ‚âà (600 * 0.30 + 800 * 2.50) / 1,000,000 ‚âà **$0.0022**
Image ‚âà **$0.05** ‚Üí **~$0.052 per full run** (posting cost covered by Late plan).

> **Tips**
>
> * Staying on **AI Studio free tier** makes LLM cost $0; only image (and your Late plan) remains. ([Google AI for Developers][1])
> * If you batch-generate captions, **Batch API is ~50% cheaper** than interactive. ([Google AI for Developers][1])

user.name: Adrian
user.bio:
Founder @RoboMarketing 

I help businesses automate communication with chatbots and AI. Focused on WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram, and website automation. 

Writing about practical automation strategies, AI tools, and conversational design. 

Passionate about building smart systems that save time and increase efficiency.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
